products.title: Oslo Blackout Indigo Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This dark indigo blue roller blind refreshes any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Splash Indigo Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful & contemporary. This dark blue, almost navy, roller blind is a very stylish, on trend colour choice. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring acorn pull which removes the need for a control chain, making it inherently child safe. Their splash indigo blue roller fabric is also moisture resistant which means it is the best choice for bathrooms and kitchens.
